img_summary: The image depicts a unique and possibly rare ingredient, likely from a fantasy or mythical context, as suggested by its unusual appearance. It is part of a collection of ingredients found in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," as indicated by the surrounding text. The image serves to visually represent one of the game's collectible items, which players can find and use within the game's world. This particular item is positioned between descriptions of other ingredients, suggesting it shares a similar role as a collectible or usable resource in the game's narrative.
